Package org.apache.orc.impl

Class HadoopShimsCurrent

java.lang.Object
org.apache.orc.impl.HadoopShimsCurrent
All Implemented Interfaces:
HadoopShims
public class HadoopShimsCurrent extends Object implements HadoopShims
Shims for recent versions of Hadoop

Adds support for:

  • Variable length HDFS blocks

    • endVariableLengthBlock

      public boolean endVariableLengthBlock(OutputStream output) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: HadoopShims
      End the OutputStream's current block at the current location. This is only available on HDFS on Hadoop ≥ 2.7, but will return false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      endVariableLengthBlock in interface HadoopShims
      Returns:
      was a variable length block created?
      Throws:
      IOException
